sense.def:
To re-examine one's own ideas or beliefs
pomeni skrbno razmisliti o svojih predstavah ali prepričanjih, ker nismo več prepričani, da so pravilne.

seg.quote: This forced researchers to re-examine their assumptions about man's early evolution.
...a re-examination of the purposes of education in modern Britain.
...a book that brings you to attentive and reflective re-examination.
